items.title: Learn Drawing and Painting a Landscape with Oil Colours

visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists
visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute

items.headline: Ignite the artist in you with oil painting techniques: Create a complex landscape painting through our easy steps. Enjoy
objectives_summary: In this course the learners will explore the techniques of using oil pai1nts to compose and create a complex landscape wherein we introduce forest, hills, water body, and sky. Painting a landscape is a challenge. It is quite difficult to depict 2D or a 3D scene. Here, in this course, we assist the learners to transcend the scenery of the landscape into the canvas using the principles of color, composition and perspective. We have included all the topics that are required to be covered to transform you into an artist. A step by step approach is used to help the learners execute their paintings. Learn and go beyond.

The course has several lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice.
The course also provides the learners different levels for understanding the techniques of creating special color effects using oil paints.
